required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of AG-946 in Healthy Volunteers and in Participants With Sickle Cell Disease
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study to Assess the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of AG-946 in Healthy Volunteers and in Subjects With Sickle Cell Disease

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to assess the safety and tolerability of AG-946 in healthy volunteers after oral administration of single ascending doses (SAD) and multiple ascending doses (MAD) of AG-946 over 14 or 28 days of dosing, and to identify a range of doses that are safe and pharmacologically active in participants with sickle cell disease. The SAD and MAD parts of the study will be randomized and double-blinded, and will assess the safety, pharmacokinetics (PK), and pharmacodynamics (PD) of AG-946 as well as the effect of food (SAD only) on the pharmacokinetics (PK) of AG-946. The sickle cell disease (SCD) part of the study will be non-randomized and open-label, and is designed to identify 1 or more safe and tolerable dose(s) of AG-946 with potential activity in the treatment of participants with sickle cell disease (SCD).

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: SAD and MAD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One Adverse Event (AE), by Severity
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49

primary_outcome.measure: SAD and MAD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One AE Related to the Study Drug
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49

primary_outcome.measure: SAD and MAD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One Serious Adverse Event (SAE)
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49

primary_outcome.measure: SAD and MAD: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Laboratory Abnormalities, by Severity
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49

primary_outcome.measure: SAD and MAD: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Changes in Vital Signs and in Electrocardiogram (ECG) Parameters
primary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49

primary_outcome.measure: SCD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One AE, by Severity
SCD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One AE Related to the Study Drug
SCD: Number of Participants Who Experienced at Least One SAE
SCD: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Laboratory Abnormalities, by Severity
SCD: Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Changes in Vital Signs and in ECG Parameters

secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 8; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56
secondary_outcome.description: Cmax will be determined under fasted and fed conditions in SAD and under fasted conditions only in MAD and SCD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Concentration (Tmax) of AG-946
secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 8; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56
secondary_outcome.description: Tmax will be determined under fasted and fed conditions in SAD and under fasted conditions only in MAD and SCD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve from Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC0-t), Time Curve from Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-∞), and Time Curve from Time Zero to Time tau Over the Dosing Interval (AUC0-τ) for AG-946
secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 8; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56
secondary_outcome.description: AUC0-t, AUC0-∞, and AUC0-τ will be determined under fasted and fed conditions in SAD and under fasted conditions only in MAD and SCD.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 8; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56
secondary_outcome.description: CL/F will be determined under fasted and fed conditions in SAD and under fasted conditions only in MAD and SCD.

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vd/F) for AG-946
secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 8; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56
secondary_outcome.description: V/F will be determined under fasted and fed conditions in SAD and under fasted conditions only in MAD and SCD.

secondary_outcome.measure: SAD: Total Amount of Drug Excreted in Urine from Time 0 to Time T (Aet) and from Time t1 to Time t2 (Aet1-t2) for AG-946 Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
SAD: Percentage Dose of Drug Excreted in Urine from Time 0 to Time t (fet) and from Time t1 to Time t2 (fet1-t2) for AG-946 Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
SAD: Renal Clearance (CLr) for AG-946 Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
Changes in the Concentration of 2,3-diphosphoglycerate (2,3-DPG) and Adenosine Triphosphate (ATP) in Whole Blood
secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Effect Curve (AUEC) from Time zero to t for 2,3-DPG and ATP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: SAD: Up to Day 13; MAD: Up to Day 49; SCD: Up to Day 56

secondary_outcome.measure: SAD: Relative Bioavailability Comparing Fasted to Fed Conditions Determined from the PK Parameters of AG-946
SCD: Change From Baseline in Hemoglobin (Hb)
SCD: Change From Baseline in Direct Bilirubin
SCD: Change From Baseline in Lactate Dehydrogenase (LDH)
SCD: Change From Baseline in Haptoglobin
SCD: Change From Baseline in Reticulocytes
SCD: Change From Baseline in Erythropoietin

arm_group.description: Participants will receive a range of doses of AG-946 or placebo, orally, once on Day 1. AG-946 will be given under fasted or fed conditions.
Participants will receive a range of doses of AG-946 or placebo, orally, once daily (QD) for 14 days or using an alternative dosing regimen for 28 days under fasted conditions.
Participants will receive a range of selected ascending doses of AG-946, orally, QD or using an alternative dosing regimen for 28 days.

intervention.description: AG-946, oral encapsulated coated-granules or tablets.
AG-946 matched-placebo, oral encapsulated sugar spheres or tablets.
